name: floriculture
content:

the growing of flowers as a business: The report said that Hawaii's floriculture and nursery products industry brings in about $100 million a year in revenue.
More examplesFewer examplesNationally, floriculture is a $13-billion-a-year industry.The cut flower industry, known in the trade as "floriculture", is a multibillion-dollar business, with interests reaching from Holland to Africa to California to South America. Larger, more profitable units are beginning to be developed, specializing in market gardening, floriculture or cattle or pig production.These tiles are found in drainage systems on land used for farming, agriculture, horticulture, or floriculture.
